CustomField.description: Enter a dynamic value that matches one of the pre-defined options listed in the documentation. This field accepts text input and is used to set the specified fields on the object records queried during this job. The entered value is validated to ensure it corresponds to an allowed option.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a dynamic value that matches one of the pre-defined options listed in the documentation. This field accepts text input and is used to set the specified fields on the object records queried during this job. The entered value is validated to ensure it corresponds to an allowed option.
CustomField.label: Dynamic Value
